nodes.documentation:
@dev This contract is used as proxy to return the hash which needs to be signed
For our current audited version of Escrow contract Proxy will contain code to generate hash
For all other furture Escrow contract versions, the version in itself should contain a function
And proxy will only be calling that function
nodes.name: EscrowProxy

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (bytes32,address[] memory,uint256[] memory) view external returns (bytes32)

nodes.name: getTransactionHash

nodes.name: getTransactionHash

getTransactionHash(address,bytes32,addre.details: Return Transaction has for the given input For our current audited version of Escrow contract Proxy will contain code to generate hash For all other furture Escrow contract versions, the version in itself should contain a function And proxy will only be calling that function

params.escrowVersion: The version of the escrow contract for which this trade is executed
